item.title: The Egg and I
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:

The Egg and I opened in SODO a few months ago offering traditional breakfast favorites in a pretty nice environment. As I said, it’s hard to really surprise when it comes to breakfast […]

The post The Egg and I appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
When it comes to breakfast food, there’s not a lot of room for creativity. Most of it has all been done before. The Egg and I opened in SODO a few months ago offering traditional breakfast favorites in a pretty nice environment.

As I said, it’s hard to really surprise when it comes to breakfast food, though when the apple granola cinnamon pancake I ordered arrived it was pretty surprising. For one, it was huge. The second it was very good and actually was something a little different. It’s your typical pancake, but with apple slices and granola mixed into the batter, then dusted with cinnamon and topped with cinnamon butter. It was actually really good.

When it comes to breakfast, there are a ton of options in Orlando, but The Egg and I serves an area where there isn’t really a lot of options (unless you count Peach Valley, but we weren’t happy with their service).

So if you’re looking for a good breakfast option that might actually surprise you, check out The Egg and I which can be found in SODO.

The post The Egg and I appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
